alert.note: Alert for Chelan (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 10 at 2:25PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of North Central Washington, including the following county, Chelan. * WHEN...Until 415 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Rapid rises on small streams and minor rock slides down the steep terrain along Highway 97 between Blewett Pass and Peshastin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 224 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Scotty Creek Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.
